an6.109:1.5: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, tinnam dhammanam pahanaya tayo dhamma bhavetabba.
an6.109:1.7: Kamavitakkassa pahanaya nekkhammavitakko bhavetabbo, byapadavitakkassa pahanaya abyapadavitakko bhavetabbo, vihimsavitakkassa pahanaya avihimsavitakko bhavetabbo.
an6.109:1.8: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, tinnam dhammanam pahanaya ime tayo dhamma bhavetabba”ti.
